name: Sam
long_description:
Sam is an AI Agent that solves repetitive support tickets end-to-end like a human.

Like a human, Sam replies via the teamâ€™s support system (Intercom, Zendesk, HubSpot, and more) and takes relevant actions such as looking up customer info, canceling subscriptions, etc.

Sam only intervenes with repetitive tickets and leaves the rest to the team. This ensures that customers always have a good experience.
one_liner: AI that solves support tickets like a human
